channel.title: Comments on: MCTS Podcast 23: Dr. Waldron’s Upcoming Writing Projects

item.title: By: Joshua
item.dc:creator: Joshua
item.description: I'm excited to hear you are writing on the regulative principle and look forward to reading your book when you finish!
item.content:encoded: I’m excited to hear you are writing on the regulative principle and look forward to reading your book when you finish!

item.title: By: Howard
item.dc:creator: Howard
item.description: If you ever have the chance to go to Plimouth Planation, you will get to hear how the Separatists were debating celebrating Christmas with the Anglicans. Of course, we know the real debate was the RPW. It was fascinating to see what it probably looked like in real life.
item.content:encoded: If you ever have the chance to go to Plimouth Planation, you will get to hear how the Separatists were debating celebrating Christmas with the Anglicans. Of course, we know the real debate was the RPW. It was fascinating to see what it probably looked like in real life.
